SELECT
m_track.ID as "id", m_track.NAME as "name", m_track.ARTIST as "artist", m_track.INSTRUMENTAL as "instrumental", m_track.ORIGINAL as "original", ifnull(r_track_rate.rate, ifnull(v_track_rate.rate,3)) as rate
FROM m_track LEFT JOIN m_file ON m_file.ID = m_track.ID LEFT JOIN v_track_rate ON m_track.ID = v_track_rate.track_id LEFT JOIN r_track_rate ON m_track.ID = r_track_rate.track_id AND r_track_rate.user_id = #{userBean.id}
m_file.ARTICLE_ID = #{articleId} AND m_file.DEL_FLG='0' AND m_track.DEL_FLG='0'
ORDER BY m_file.ORDER_NO
